nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 12 is the twelfth issue of the youth comic book series Star Wars Adventures. The issue includes the stories "Intermission, Part I," by Elsa Charretier and Pierrick Colinet, and "Tales from Wild Space: A Small Push," by Scott Peterson. Star Wars Adventures 12 was released by IDW Publishing on July 25, 2018.
Anakin Skywalker and Padmé Amidala embark on an adventure filled with danger and romance in a story by fan-favorites Elsa Charretier and Pierrick Colinet!
